load("hw2_list.rda")

[1] "patient" "pre_bp"  "post_bp" "diff_bp" "normal" 

names(bp_list$placebo)

[1] "patient" "pre_bp"  "post_bp" "diff_bp" "normal"

title: index.qmd
text:
We load the provided .rda file, which contains our list bp_list with treatment and placebo data frames.

load("hw2_list.rda")

names(bp_list$treatment)

[1] "patient" "pre_bp"  "post_bp" "diff_bp" "normal" 

names(bp_list$placebo)

[1] "patient" "pre_bp"  "post_bp" "diff_bp" "normal"

title: index.qmd
index.qmd
text:
Task 2: Function Writing
We now write a function that calculates a statistic (default: mean) for pre, post, and diff columns of both treatment and placebo data.

my_summary <- function(df_list, stat = "mean") {
  my_fun <- get(stat)  # convert string like "mean" into a function
  
  # compute for treatment
  treat_vals <- sapply(df_list$treatment[, c("pre_bp", "post_bp", "diff_bp")], my_fun)
  
  # compute for placebo
  plac_vals  <- sapply(df_list$placebo[, c("pre_bp", "post_bp", "diff_bp")], my_fun)
  
  # combine results
  results <- c(treat_vals, plac_vals)
  
  # assign names
  names(results) <- c(
    paste0(stat, "_treat_pre"),
    paste0(stat, "_treat_post"),
    paste0(stat, "_treat_diff"),
    paste0(stat, "_plac_pre"),
    paste0(stat, "_plac_post"),
    paste0(stat, "_plac_diff")
  )
  
  return(results)
}
# Default (mean)
my_summary(bp_list)

 mean_treat_pre mean_treat_post mean_treat_diff   mean_plac_pre  mean_plac_post 
         131.60          125.95            5.65          131.90          128.90 
 mean_plac_diff 
           3.00 

# Variance
my_summary(bp_list, "var")

 var_treat_pre var_treat_post var_treat_diff   var_plac_pre  var_plac_post 
      75.72632       78.99737      117.81842      149.87778      124.98889 
 var_plac_diff 
     341.33333 

# Standard Deviation
my_summary(bp_list, "sd")

 sd_treat_pre sd_treat_post sd_treat_diff   sd_plac_pre  sd_plac_post 
     8.702087      8.888046     10.854419     12.242458     11.179843 
 sd_plac_diff 
    18.475209 

# Minimum
my_summary(bp_list, "min")

 min_treat_pre min_treat_post min_treat_diff   min_plac_pre  min_plac_post 
           115            114            -24            114            105 
 min_plac_diff 
           -21 

# Maximum
my_summary(bp_list, "max")

 max_treat_pre max_treat_post max_treat_diff   max_plac_pre  max_plac_post 
           151            146             21            152            143 
 max_plac_diff 
            33
